, usually referred to simply as
, is a Canadian ski resort located 56 km (35 mi) southeast of
, in the Central Okanagan area of the Okanagan/Shuswap Valley in

(also known as Whistler-Blackcomb), making it one of the larger resorts in North America.
Big White is located in the
region of British Columbia, in

. The mountain summit is at 2,319 m (7,608 ft) with a vertical drop of 777 m (2,549 ft), serviced by 16 lifts. The mountain receives 750 cm of annual snowfall. It has 2,765 acres (11 km²) of patrolled area of a total of 7,355 acres (30 km²) skiable. With 38 acres of night skiing, Big White has western Canada's largest resort night skiing area. It has a central village which comprises accommodation, eateries, bars and shops. The village is 1,755 m (5,758 ft) above sea level. Big White Mountain is one of the highest peaks in the southern Monashees, with well over 100 marked runs.
Big White Ski Resort is 56 km (35 mi) South East of Kelowna, the largest city in the Okanagan Valley.

value: From Kelowna, follow Highway 33 for 32 km (20 mi) until you reach Big White Road. Another 24 km (15 mi) and you will arrive in the main village.
, BC - 438 km (273 mi) - 4.5 hrs via Hwy 97C

To get to Big White, you can also fly into Kelowna International Airport, then drive from there (see above).

Aside from the amazing ski hills, there is a lot to do at Big White. While Big White is known for its winter sports, including downhill and cross-country skiing, snowboarding, snowshoeing, snowmobiling, tubing, ice skating, sleigh rides and even dog sledding, there is no shortage of things to do in the Spring, Summer and Fall. Since Big White is in the Okanagan Valley, there are many non-winter activities to take part in, such as winery tours, hiking and mountain biking, to name but a few.
Big White has no shortage of places to eat within the village.

value: hours=Open Tuesday to Sunday. Lunch 12PM-3PM. Dinner from 6PM
content=Features regular wine tastings and events. Menu has an Italian and Mediterranean theme for the 2012-13 season. Reservations recommended.
Kettle Valley Steakhouse and Wine Bar
Ride the gondola to Happy Valley where you’ll find delectable cuisine in relaxed surroundings, and a stylish wine bar offering world-renowned Okanagan wines.
Located in the Chateau Big White in the heart of the Big White village, the Swiss Bear is open for breakfast, lunch and dinner. Famous for their mouth watering European cuisine and delicious fondues.
Located in the Whitefoot Lodge, Frank’s Chinese Laundry offers a wonderful Chinese dining experience. With a lunchtime buffet great for getting back on the slopes quickly.
Located slope side in the White Crystal Inn, The Copper Kettle Grill is open for breakfast, lunch and dinner.
Located in the lower level of the Village Centre Mall and featuring mouthwatering pizza for eat-in or take-out. Delivery is also available.
Serving hearty breakfasts, daily homemade soups, fresh salads & baked goods as well as burgers and fries. Located at the base of the Ridge Rocket and Plaza chairs.
Located at the Westridge Warming Hut. Great coffee, fresh sandwiches and baked goods.

Since Big White is such an active place all year round, there are many places to unwind after a day on the slopes or a day mountain biking in the woods. Here's a short list of places to have a drink and relax after being outside all day:

value: Raakel's Ridge Pub and Coltino's Ristorante. Ski in/ski out location at Big White Ski Resort.

Sam’s has great pub atmosphere. Meals, après ski, games, DJ entertainment and live bands. The dining room is located upstairs and features a big stone fireplace, superb food and the famous ‘Gunbarrel Coffee’ show.

The Loose Moose, located at the Happy Valley Day Lodge, has a fun atmosphere for the whole family. During the day the Loose Moose is the café which offers a variety of coffees, and pastries. In the evening, it's a family friendly restaurant that offers a full kids menu while you enjoy nightly events entertainment
Located in the White Crystal Inn, the Snow Ghost Lounge features live entertainment on weekends.
Featuring East Indian delicacies, this bar has an inviting and friendly atmosphere. Located at the Inn at Big White.
